DOC.brief_summary: Investigator initiate multi-institutional retrospective review clinical radiographic outcome 90Y resin microsphere radioembolization metastatic colorectal liver metastases USA . The target least 1,000 evaluable patient 12+ week follow .
DOC.brief_title: Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Liver Metastases Outcomes After Resin 90Y Microsphere Radioembolization USA Evaluation Project
DOC.detailed_description: Investigator initiate multi-institutional retrospective review clinical radiographic outcome 90Y resin microsphere radioembolization metastatic colorectal liver metastases USA . The target least 1,000 evaluable patient 12+ week follow . Objectives : Independent data collection reporting pre treatment 12 week post treatment clinical , radiographic radiation parameter outcomes patient treated USA 2002-2010 . Data beyond 12 week collect highly desirable , however minimum patient 12 week follow .
DOC.criteria: Patients receive 90Y resin microsphere radioembolization metastatic colorectal cancer liver metastases November 2010 March 2011 USA . Patients must least 12 week follow . Patients receive glass 90Y microsphere radioembolization metastatic colorectal liver metastasis .
